testcase.name: useIsMobile > should return false initially when window width is >= 768px
useIsMobile > should return true initially when window width is < 768px
useIsMobile > should call matchMedia with correct query
useIsMobile > should register event listener for matchMedia changes
useIsMobile > should update when matchMedia change event fires
useIsMobile > should update when resizing from mobile to desktop
useIsMobile > should cleanup event listener on unmount
useIsMobile > should handle boundary case at exactly 768px as desktop
useIsMobile > should handle boundary case at 767px as mobile
